document.full_text: "unabomber" ted kaczynski's personal journals sold for over $40,000 on thursday in an online auction of his personal belongings, authorities said.
document.title: "unabomber" journals sell for $40,000 in auction
lines_and_colors: "unabomber" ted kaczynski's personal journals sold for over $40,000 on thursday in an online auction of his personal belongings, authorities said.
